definition:
A *realization of a graph* $G$ in a topological space $X$ is an
injective map $\rho:G\to X$ such that $G$ with the graph topology is
homeomorphic to $\rho(G)$ with the subspace topology. Of particular
interest are realizations of $G$ in 3-dimensional Euclidean space, where
each of the edges is a line segment, and where no 4 points of $G$ are
coplanar.
